C

ClientThread - Class in fi.sdeska.messenger.server

F

fi.sdeska.messenger - package fi.sdeska.messenger
Provides the server- and clientside software for a simple messenger app.
fi.sdeska.messenger.client - package fi.sdeska.messenger.client
Provides the clientside software for a simple messenger app.
fi.sdeska.messenger.server - package fi.sdeska.messenger.server
Provides the serverside software for a simple messenger app.
fi.sdeska.messenger.utility - package fi.sdeska.messenger.utility
Contains utility and general use functions.

G

getConnections() - Static method in class fi.sdeska.messenger.server.MessengerServer
Gets a map of all the active connections.

Gets the username assigned to the client.
getSocket() - Method in class fi.sdeska.messenger.client.MessengerClient
Gets the network socket used for communication with the server.

L

listenForConnections() - Method in class fi.sdeska.messenger.server.MessengerServer
Listens for incoming connections in a loop.
